law.history: Repealed 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 35, effective June 17, 1954. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 194, secs. 5, 6, and 7. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1; and ch. 93, sec. 5. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4281b-3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Deductions allowed from gross income, to all taxpayers.
